name: VALTORO
description: VALTORO is a blockchain-based project that integrates automated trading technology with token utility. Built under Valtoro Spartan Trading, the project provides access to MEV and algorithmic trading bots, designed to generate transparent on-chain activity and create opportunities for users within the platform. The VALTORO token powers this ecosystem by enabling deposits, withdrawals, referral rewards, and participation in future governance features. The projectâ€™s goal is to bridge automated trading and community-driven incentives, offering both functionality and accessibility to its users.
